item.title: PROCESSO DE RECRUTAMENTO: “O NOVO TRABALHO A TEMPO INTEIRO”
item.dc:creator: beatrizjmonteiro
item.description: Companies are losing excellent employees due to extra steps that don’t add value. If they need 4-6 interviews to validate whether they want to hire someone, the company are the problem, not the candidates. You should look for 3 things: – Character– Attitude– Reliability Anything else can be coached.  A resume shows our accomplishments, a conversation shows who we are.
item.content:encoded:
Companies are losing excellent employees due to extra steps that don’t add value. If they need 4-6 interviews to validate whether they want to hire someone, the company are the problem, not the candidates. 
You should look for 3 things: 
– Character
– Attitude
– Reliability 
Anything else can be coached.  A resume shows our accomplishments, a conversation shows who we are.

item.dc:creator: beatrizjmonteiro

item.content:encoded:
As my mother usually says, I am a young woman who cannot sit still and is always “inventing”, qualities that I consider indispensable in the path I intend to follow professionally. 

Today, I’m publishing with the intention of showing you a project that I started on behalf of my father, José Monteiro. Since I was very young I have seen my father in the area of carpentry and construction, I even have a special memory of the day he built me a dollhouse (the house was bigger than me), such was the emotion of a 5 year old child. 

I have always motivated my father to have his own business but life has not yet given him that breakthrough. Inspired, I decided to develop part of the visual communication, i.e. the logo and its respective application, giving life and motivating my father, thanking him for the wonderful memories.

Below I leave the link to the project, I would like to know your professional opinions.

See the full article here.
